caption.title: Log-transformed response values of Mikania micrantha with and without competition to defoliation intensities. Values are meansÂ±standard deviation. The different lowercase and uppercase letters indicate significant differences ( p<0.05) among the defoliation intensities of invasive Mikania micrantha growing with and without native competitor, respectively. * indicates significant differences ( p<0.05) between the treatments with or without competitor.
